text: w'idha 'absar almushrikun yawm alqiamat alihatuhum alati ebdwha mae allh, qalu: rabana hwla' shurakawuna aladhin kunaa naebuduhum min dwnk, fntqat alalihat btkdhyb man ebdwha, wqalt: 'iinakum -ayha almshrkwn- lakadhbwn, hin jeltmwna shuraka' lilah webdtmwna meh, falam namrkm bdhlk, wala zemna 'anana msthqwn llalwhyt, fallwm elykm
